wantStartMissionPhrase.content: Okay, but I'm sorry to hear you go. Would you like to switch a different activity instead?

wantResetProgressPhrase.content: Are you sure you want to discontinue the game and lose all your progress and score?

wantExitPhrase.content: Are you done playing this game for today?

returnToGamePhrase.content: Are you ready to be returned to the game process?

repeatLastPhrase.content: I don't understand you. Please, repeat last command

exitAfterCancelPhrase.content: Alright, hope to see you again soon

exitPhrase.content: Alright, hope to see you again soon

wantMissionFromBeginningPhrase.content: Do you want to start mission from the beginning?

generalHelpPhrase.content: You are competing against your friend Ben. The game is played until 11 points. During each round, you will be playing one of 5 fun activities.

trySomethingElsePhrase.content: Would you like to try something else?

selectActivityBetweenTwoPhrase.content: Do you want to play Last Letter or Bam Wham?

selectActivityBetweenThreePhrase.content: Do you want to play Last Letter, Bam Wham or Alphabet Race?

selectActivityBetweenAllPhrase.content: Do you want to play Last Letter, Bam Wham or Something Else?

selectActivityBetweenOthersPhrase.content: Do you want to play Alphabet Race or Rhyme Match?

wantRestartPhrase.content: Would you like to try another game?

helpRepeatPlay.content: Would you like me to repeat that?

fireworksWhistles.content: What a great idea, Ben. Here we go.

purchaseNoRefund.content: You haven't purchased the expansion pack yet. You can say - what can I buy - to get information about the expansion pack, or say yes to return to the match.

purchaseNothing.content: There are no products available for purchase right now. Would you like to return to the main menu?

purchaseWhat.content: You can purchase the expansion pack, it gives you access to all premium activities and features. Would you like you to learn more?

purchaseUpsell.content: If you would like to play this, and all other, premium activities you will need to purchase the expansion pack. Want to learn more?

purchaseHistory.content: Thanks for buying the expansion pack, with unlimited access to all of the activities. Would you like to try one of them out?

purchaseHistoryReprompt.content: You asked me what you bought, it was the expansion pack, with unlimited access to all of this games features. Would you like to continue with one of the premium activities?

purchaseHistoryNothing.content: You have not purchased the expansion pack which gives unlimited access to all premium activities. You can say - what can I buy - to learn more. Would you like to continue?

purchaseHistoryNothingReprompt.content: You asked me what you bought, but you haven't purchased anything yet. You can say - what can I buy to purchase the expansion pack, or say continue to return to the adventure.

purchaseWait.content: While you wait, would you like to continue with one of the available activities?

purchasePending.content: I've asked for permission to purchase the expansion pack. In the meantime, would you like to continue playing?

purchaseStillPending.content: Your purchase is still pending. Would you like to continue?

purchaseAlreadyDone.content: You already own the expansion pack. Would you like to play one of the premium activities?

purchaseAlreadyDoneReprompt.content: Want to select a premium activity?

purchaseUnsuccessful.content: We couldn't complete the purchase. You can always ask me how to get more features later. For now, want to continue with one of the available activities?

purchaseDeclined.content: Sorry, your purchase was declined, For now, Want to continue with one of the available activities?

purchaseError.content: Sorry, looks like the store is closed for now. Want to continue with one of the available activities?

purchaseCancel.content: In the future you can purchase the expansion pack by saying “what can I buy”. For now, want to continue with one of the available activities?

purchaseComplete.content: Congrats, your purchase was completed! Would you like to continue playing with one of your newly available activities?

purchaseCompleteReprompt.content: Would you like to continue your match with one of the premium activities?

unrecognized.content: I didn't catch that. What can I help you with?

playAgainReprompt.content: Want to continue with one of the available activities?

noMorePremium.content: Sorry this activity is only available once per day, would you like to try something else?

purchaseNothingToRefund.content: You have not made any purchases, there is nothing to refund. Would you like to continue?

unknownRequest.content: Sorry, I am not sure. What can I help you with?
